overview: A comprehensive machine learning roadmap covering mathematics, algorithms, deep learning, MLOps, and practical applications in modern AI systems.

steps.title: Mathematics & Statistics Foundation
steps.description: Build strong mathematical foundations essential for understanding ML algorithms.

steps.title: Python Programming for ML
steps.description: Master Python and essential libraries for data science and machine learning.

steps.title: Data Preprocessing & EDA
steps.description: Learn data cleaning, feature engineering, and exploratory data analysis techniques.
resources: Data cleaning and handling missing values

steps.title: Classical Machine Learning
steps.description: Master supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms and their applications.

steps.title: Deep Learning Fundamentals
steps.description: Understand neural networks, backpropagation, and deep learning architectures.

steps.title: Advanced Deep Learning
steps.description: Explore cutting-edge architectures and techniques in deep learning.

steps.title: MLOps & Production Systems
steps.description: Learn to deploy, monitor, and maintain ML models in production environments.
resources: Model versioning and experiment tracking (MLflow, Weights & Biases)

steps.title: Specialized Applications
steps.description: Dive deep into specific domains and advanced ML applications.

steps.title: Ethics & Responsible AI
steps.description: Understand bias, fairness, and ethical considerations in ML systems.
